prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that can hypnotize its opponents with a pendulum.
I want a Pokemon with yellow fur and a distinctive white collar around its neck.
Generate an image of a bipedal creature that excels in mind-based battles.
Make a Pokemon that uses its psychic powers to manipulate dreams and illusions.
Imagine a Pokemon that roams urban environments, using its abilities to gather information.
Design a Pokemon that combines yellow and white colors with a mysterious aura.
Show me a creature that can induce sleep in others with its mesmerizing gaze.
